work.summary: Stop watching, start playing. We're connecting gaming communities through truly interactive live streams.
Track Intel provides a premium SaaS Motorsports Management Platform to prestigious racing organizations around the world. Everything from Registration to Results is covered by the platform.
highlights: 2014,2015 Isle of Man TT on site technical Support and Systems Manager
Developed a live race simulator for Isle of Man staff to predict rider patterns to help with course management
Developed streamlined Technical Inspection Cordova app for a fleet of android tablets

work.summary: Helped in providing seamless software solutions for clients in the financial services sector.
highlights: Helped introduce Robot Framework based acceptance testing to the company.
Introduced Unit Testing to the in-house programming language

work.summary: Track Intel provides a premium SaaS Motorsports Management Platform to prestigious racing organizations around the world. Everything from Registration to Results is covered by the platform.
highlights: Developed a live Facebook integration to provide realtime status updates of a rider's performance in a race.
Developed a custom reporting system to provide easily configureable results reports
